subject: Order #SSN5284
description_text:
I received my handbrake today but my shifter still hasn't shipped yet. When
will it ship out?

conversations.body_text: Hi tevin47217,  Due to a few days off during the New Year holiday, emails were accumulated, which caused a delay in our response. We sincerely apologize for this. We are currently working overtime to produce the HS Pro, and we will arrange shipment for you as soon as possible.

Hi tevin47217,    Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks—it's simply too popular. We'll ship it out to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224475154
